reviews.review: Very great and imaginative game, but the overall tuning of the game, very bad servers, validation of hits uncorrected after several years of this game, the game has no rules, so toxic players can quickly destroy it.
Ni siquiera me gustan los juegos de terror o suspenso, aun as√≠, me acelera el coraz√≥n cada vez que juego esto
Just be patient while matchmaking as a killer

Okay look.

I have too many hours on this game, I honestly still don't know what I'm doing with my life after becoming addicted to it.
But let's get to the point...

Should you buy it?

Well, if you like to get killed by your teammates, and (some) toxic killers... then yes for sure! But please, do not play this game alone, or you will be raging about every single solo queue teammate you find or about that killer that is facecamping or using NO.E.D. or tunneling or... I honestly don't know. There's too many options for killers to be toxic towards you.

But.
Even though you deal with these things every day, you will still try to be the best at it, because it's a very challenging and brain-using game. Sometimes you will also come across amazing teammates or super nice  killers that farm bloodpoints with you and it's an amazing connection.

In this game I met friends that I will probably not leave for years and who I have tons of fun with.

So yeah, buy it.
gostosinho com os amigos numa noitada
It can be fun with friends but if u are alone play only killer its not worth to save randoms.

In terms of being good & fun and having a good community the game is more in the middle, but as someone whose been playing since late 2018 dead by daylight has had many many ups and downs especially when they made the biggest change in survivor animations and the HUD. Overall the game is still somewhat good/
Very addicting and fun, would recommend to play with friends though, as you can get frustrated with solo queue.

Ensalada de frutas

Cuando prepares alguna ensalada de frutas que lleve ingredientes muy jugosos (kiwi, sand√≠a, naranjas o mangos), no es necesario que agregues jugo, porque quedar√≠a demasiado aguada.
Es recomendable usar frutas que est√©n en su punto justo de madurez, para que el sabor se vea incrementado, y adem√°s, porque las frutas pasadas de tiempo pueden acelerar la descomposici√≥n de la ensalada.
Si las frutas est√°n un poco pasadas en madurez puedes guardarlas en la heladera hasta el momento de usarlas, ya que el fr√≠o detiene el proceso de maduraci√≥n.
Si a√∫n est√°n verdes, debes colocarlas en bolsas de papel, en lugares oscuros y sin humedad, hasta que alcancen su punto justo.
Puedes a√±adir az√∫car para endulzar, pero siempre justo antes de consumir la ensalada, para que no se ablanden las frutas. Puedes utilizar tambi√©n endulzante en caso de que quieras endulzar de una forma sana. Es recomendable el edulcorante que est√° hecho para cocinar.
Si tu inter√©s no est√° en las dietas y quieres disfrutar de una ensalada de frutas con un mayor nivel nutritivo y sabor distinto, agrega frutas secas o deshidratadas, como almendras o nueces.
Para realzar el aroma e intensidad, prep√°rala al menos con un d√≠a de anticipaci√≥n.
Si quieres una ensalada bien decorada y presentada, puedes utilizar una c√°scara de una pi√±a previamente cortada por la mitad y vac√≠a. Para decorarla, usa hierbas arom√°ticas frescas (como menta); crema chantilly o yogurt.

i spent way too much time on this game 

10/10 would recommend

I have played this game for months, mainly on PS4, with little problem, but there are a coupple things I want to address:

*As a survivor, I have been hit many times by killers when A. they weren't even close, B. I've been hit over objects and C. I've also been hit when I'm over a window
*The perk "Dead Hard" can be very delayed and there have been many times where it should've activated but it didn't
*I understand that they are a free alt to buying Auric Cells (the in-game currency) but it is too timely to get Iridescent Shards. You only get about 50-300/level and one level alone takes ages to get, so imagine trying to get 21.000 to buy a skin. They're a good way to get people and skins for free but it's just too time consuming to save enough to buy a skin for 21.000

Other than these flaws, the game is super good, the graphics are amazing and it's fun trying to learn all the perks, gadgets and abilities of everyone. 99% RECOMEND
